title: TestDataAgent Input Contract
description: Input requirements for the TestData Agent (formerly DataPrepAgent). CRITICAL: Both listing_selectors and detail_selectors must be passed from Selector Agent for deterministic extraction.

target_url.description: Base URL of the site to analyze (listing page URL)

pagination_type.description: Type of pagination discovered by Discovery Agent

pagination_max_pages.description: Maximum number of pagination pages (from Discovery Agent)

listing_selectors.description: CRITICAL: Complete listing selectors from Selector Agent. Used for deterministic URL extraction in code. Pass the ENTIRE listing_selectors object.

listing_container.description: Selector chain for main content container

article_link.description: Selector chain for article link elements

detail_selectors.description: CRITICAL: Complete detail selectors from Selector Agent for all article fields. Selectors are executed in Python code for deterministic extraction - NOT interpreted by LLM. Pass the ENTIRE detail_selectors object to ensure FULL content extraction.

additionalProperties.description: Selector chain for this field - array ordered by priority

article_selector.description: Primary CSS selector for article links (backward compatible, prefer listing_selectors.article_link)

listing_container_selector.description: Primary CSS selector for main content area (backward compatible, prefer listing_selectors.listing_container)

collected_article_urls.description: Pre-discovered article URLs from Selector Agent (optional, agent can discover its own)
